movie_title: Heatwaves: Can we adapt? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Many cities are getting hotter and hotter. This can cause many problems for the people who live in t

vocabulary.definition: introducing or using new ideas or methods
vocabulary.example: The company introduced an innovative approach to recycling plastic.

vocabulary.definition: a means of supporting oneself; a way of making a living
vocabulary.example: Farming is the livelihood of many people in rural areas.

vocabulary.definition: to support financially; to pay part of the cost of something
vocabulary.example: The government decided to subsidise public transportation for low-income families.

vocabulary.definition: a very poor and overcrowded area of a city
vocabulary.example: The charity organization works to improve living conditions in the slums.

vocabulary.definition: having the property of reflecting light or heat
vocabulary.example: The new windows are made of reflective glass to reduce heat inside the building.

vocabulary.definition: passing salty water through the skin to regulate body temperature
vocabulary.example: After running, he could feel the sweat dripping down his face.
